org.treetank.io
Interface IReader

All Known Subinterfaces:
IWriter
All Known Implementing Classes:
BerkeleyReader, BerkeleyWriter, FileReader, FileWriter
public interface IReader

Interface for reading the stored pages in every backend.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
